name: Andor - the Cards of Wonder
description: Andor - The Card of Wonder is a cross-platform(Pc & Mobile) multi-player online card game (CCG). The game has five factions and about 500 magic cards to choose from, filled with infinite possibilities of deep strategy combinations. Players can build their decks with their own preferences to compete with others.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x86/x64 Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics HD 4000 or Nvidia GT 620 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
